name: Cynthia CLARK, Appellee, v. PHILADELPHIA COLLEGE OF OSTEOPATHIC MEDICINE, et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Clark v. Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Cynthia CLARK, Appellee, v. PHILADELPHIA COLLEGE OF OSTEOPATHIC MEDICINE, et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of August, 1999, this appeal is dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: R. Bruce Morrison, Philadelphia, for John P. Simelaro, D.O. and PCOM.
Carole F. Kafrissen, Philadelphia, Thomas R. Schneider, for Cynthia Clark.
casebody.head_matter:
734 A.2d 859
Cynthia CLARK, Appellee, v. PHILADELPHIA COLLEGE OF OSTEOPATHIC MEDICINE, et al., Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 27, 1999.
R. Bruce Morrison, Philadelphia, for John P. Simelaro, D.O. and PCOM.
Carole F. Kafrissen, Philadelphia, Thomas R. Schneider, for Cynthia Clark.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
